review:
So I came across Doctor Rajesh Kansal through Practo. Then I checked his google reviews, since it‚Äôs always a bit of uncertainty trying on a new Doctor. However when I met with doctor Rajesh he was really humble and friendly and not like other doctors to put stress on a patient‚Äôs mental health. He didn‚Äôt give me any unnecessary medication or tests. Just told me certain changes in diet and day to day life to fix my issues. Highly recommended doctor for anyone looking for a good doctor in Delhi. 
Thank you.

Very nice doctor. Gives proper time to patient‚Äôs. Listen to them very carefully .
Give guidance very nice

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I came across this doctor (messenger of GOD in today's time), for the first time during this pandemic after 3 days of simple flu..When I contacted the doctor out of sight without recommendations from any one he told me it is simple flu and we will treat it even if it is covid we will treat it with medicines...And believe me it was covid and without getting my test done he knew what was it and he did wonders...He helped me recover and my mother too thereafter...He is truly a mmessenger who can save lives and do wonders..Highly recommended dactor,patient,friendly,easily approachable...Go with him without giving a second thought...Thank you air for all the support and good work...Hats off sirüôèüôèüôè
Excellent experience‚Ä¶very nice and experienced doctor - could discuss all my issues in detail - got accurate and fast solution

Dr. Rajesh Kansal was terrific. ************** sensitive and informative.All the staff was very friendly,helpful and professional.I had a great experience as a first timer.I would have no qualms in recommending his preference to my family and friends.

Dr. You are a messenger of God for us. You treated so well in covid period of my mother that words are short to express my gratitude for you. Thank you so much for timely follow ups. You were available day and night for us. Thank you so much for being there for us in hardest times. Your medication and timely examination were so good that mom has fully recovered. Thank you so much Dr. üôè

Words cannot describe how grateful I am for Dr. Kansal, **** *** ** *** **** ******* treated me and my family from COVID-19 infection when there were no proper medications for it.
Thank you so much Dr. Kansal for the difference you make in the lives of your patients! Your kindness, sincere caring, and concern make everything better and are a great encouragement.

*** ****** ** *** **** ****** *** *** **** **** ** **** ***** ** *** ***** ********* ** *** ******* ******** **** I had a skin problem of around 10 yrs which was not getting cured completely but he made it to come to bare minimum by his guidance. 
P.s.- this is not a paid review
Doctor is calm and listened to me really well. I felt heard after so long. He checked all my reports thoroughly.
Nice doc , Feedback will be given later. As the treatment is under process, long experience, helpful staff

*** ****** ** *** **** ******* he gives the  consultation on phone also and we will recommend him to others also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly experienced doctor, very friendly, and cares deeply for his patients. Dr.Kansal has treated all of my health concerns for 20+ years. Would highly recommend to everyone.
*** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ***. He is always deeply discuss before suggesting medicine . He is our family doctor.
****** *** **** ***** He was very cooperative...whenever we used to ask something he was available at any time.
Great person, well qualified, honest, dr.kansal has great attitude towards his patients..great experience

Dr. Kansal has been of a great help or simply he has been a saviour to us. 
While in the times of covid and having my father being diagnosed with the same followed by my uncle, Dr. Kansal kept a keen eye on both rather provided us with all the amenities needed once the oxygen levels went decreasing to the earliest.
